snippet: N.H.L. team owners and the players union exchanged proposals as negotiations accelerated Wednesday night.
abstract: NHL owners and players' union exchange proposals as negotiations accelerate amid growing optimism that a season-saving settlement is within reach.
lead_paragraph: N.H.L. team owners and the players union exchanged proposals as negotiations accelerated Wednesday night.

headline.seo: Owners Appear Upbeat After N.H.L. Talks
headline.main: Suddenly, Optimistic Signs Abound in N.H.L. Talks
headline.print_headline: Suddenly, Optimistic Signs Abound in N.H.L. Talks
